/etc/init.d/apache2 start: just a warning, don't worry about it atm
just means you need to set the server name in the config file
and see if it says "direct rendering - yes"
then change your /etc/X11/xorg.conf the line that has "nv" to "nvidia"
theres so much now to the glxinfo
that should tell you what fps your getting, anything under 1000 is an older card usually., my geforce go 6800 gets 11,000
thanks so much for all the help :)
